create_central_kitchen.ponder.chiller.te: Also, Use Mechanical Arm to insert ice or snow into Chiller
create_central_kitchen.ponder.cooking_po: Funnel also can take out cooked food
create_central_kitchen.ponder.cutting_bo: This is a Cutting Board. Previously, it could semi-automated with Deployer
Now, Mechanical Arm can put raw ingredient on Cutting Board
Deployer with a knife in Use Mode can cut raw ingredient
Mechanical Saw also can cut raw ingredient
create_central_kitchen.ponder.heat_sourc: This is a Blaze Burner, a common boiler heater
Boiler heaters are valid heat sources for cooking utensils
Boiler heaters accelerate some cooking utensils according to its heat-level
create_central_kitchen.ponder.keg.part_o: Automating with Create: Keg - Part One
Pipe can insert fluids directly into Keg
Pipe can also extract fluids from Keg
Funnel can extract special item product from Keg
create_central_kitchen.ponder.keg.part_t: Automating with Create: Keg - Part Two
create_central_kitchen.ponder.keg.pourin: Use spout to fill Tankard with drink
Pour drink out of Tankard with Item Drain
create_central_kitchen.ponder.shared.arm: Use Mechanical Arm to insert food container.
Mechanical Arm can take out cooked food.
create_central_kitchen.ponder.shared.pac: Use Packager to automate ingredient insertion.
create_central_kitchen.ponder.shared.pip: Use Pipe to insert liquid ingredient.
create_central_kitchen.ponder.shared.use: Factory gauges are very useful in the packaging process.
create_central_kitchen.ponder.skillet_an: Automating with Create: Skillet and Stove
Mechanical Arm can put raw ingredient onto Stove and Skillet
pack.create_central_kitchen.runtime.desc: Create: Central Kitchen Runtime Generated Resources
